11  bool Robot::GetRobotInfoHandler(cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo::Request &req, cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo::Response &res)
12  {
13  res.Model=get_ModelName();
14  res.CountJoints=(uint32_t)m_CountJoints;
15  for(size_t i=0;i<m_InputChannels.size();i++)
16  res.InputChannels.push_back(m_InputChannels[i].Name);
17  for(size_t i=0;i<m_OutputChannels.size();i++)
18  res.OutputChannels.push_back(m_OutputChannels[i].Name);
19  return true;
20  }
21 
26  bool Robot::GetJointInfoHandler(cpr_robot::GetJointInfo::Request &req, cpr_robot::GetJointInfo::Response &res)
27  {
28  if(req.JointId<m_CountJoints)
29  {
30  res.JointName=m_pJoints[req.JointId]->get_JointName();
31  res.JointType=0;
32  return true;
33  }
34  else
35  {
36  return false;
37  }
38 
39  }

54 
58  Robot::Robot(const size_t countJoints, const size_t countIOmodules) :
59  m_CountJoints(countJoints),
60  m_CountIOmodules(countIOmodules),
61  m_Bus("can0")
62  {
63  m_ModelName="Unknown Model";
64  m_pJoints=new Joint*[m_CountJoints];
65  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
66  m_pJoints[i]=new Joint(m_Bus,(unsigned int)(i+1));
67  m_pIOmodules=new Joint*[m_CountIOmodules];
68  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountIOmodules;i++)
69  m_pIOmodules[i]=new Joint(m_Bus,(unsigned int)(i+7));
70  m_JointStatePublisher=m_Node.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("/joint_states", 50);
71  m_RobotStatePublisher=m_Node.advertise<cpr_robot::RobotState>("/robot_state",50);
72  m_InputChannelsPublisher=m_Node.advertise<cpr_robot::ChannelStates>("/InputChannels",50);
73  m_OutputChannelsPublisher=m_Node.advertise<cpr_robot::ChannelStates>("/OutputChannels",50);
74  m_GetRobotInfoServer=m_Node.advertiseService("/GetRobotInfo",&Robot::GetRobotInfoHandler, this);
75  m_GetJointInfoServer=m_Node.advertiseService("/GetJointInfo",&Robot::GetJointInfoHandler, this);
76  m_RobotCommandServer=m_Node.advertiseService("/RobotCommand",&Robot::RobotCommandHandler, this);
77  m_Override=0.25;
78  }
79 
84  bool Robot::RobotCommandHandler(cpr_robot::RobotCommand::Request &req, cpr_robot::RobotCommand::Response &res)
85  {
86  switch(req.CommandId)
87  {
88  default:
89  ROS_ERROR("Received invalid command from %s: %ui",req.Sender.c_str(),req.CommandId);
90  return false;
91  case COMMAND_OVERRIDE:
92  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_OVERRIDE from %s. Override=%lf%%",req.Sender.c_str(),100.0*req.PayloadFloat);
93  m_Override=req.PayloadFloat;
94  return true;
95  case COMMAND_CONNECT:
96  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_CONNECT from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
97  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
98  m_pJoints[i]->Start();
99  m_Bus.Start();
100  return true;
101  case COMMAND_DISCONNECT:
102  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_DISCONNECT from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
103  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
104  m_pJoints[i]->Stop();
105  m_Bus.Stop();
106  return true;
107  case COMMAND_ENABLE:
108  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_ENABLE from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
109  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
110  m_pJoints[i]->EnableMotor();
111  return true;
112  case COMMAND_DISABLE:
113  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_DISABLE from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
114  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
115  m_pJoints[i]->DisableMotor();
116  return true;
117  case COMMAND_STARTREFERENCING:
118  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_STARTREFERENCING from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
119  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
120  m_pJoints[i]->StartReferencing();
121  return true;
122  case COMMAND_DOUT_ENABLE:
123  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_DOUT_ENABLE from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
124  if((req.PayloadInt>=0)&&(req.PayloadInt<m_OutputChannels.size()))
125  {
126  set_Output((uint32_t)req.PayloadInt,true);
127  return true;
128  }
129  else
130  {
131  ROS_ERROR("Received invalid digital output: %li",req.PayloadInt);
132  return false;
133  }
134  case COMMAND_DOUT_DISABLE:
135  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_DOUT_DISABLE from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
136  if((req.PayloadInt>=0)&&(req.PayloadInt<m_OutputChannels.size()))
137  {
138  set_Output((uint32_t)req.PayloadInt,false);
139  return true;
140  }
141  else
142  {
143  ROS_ERROR("Received invalid digital output: %li",req.PayloadInt);
144  return false;
145  }
146  }
147  }
148 
150  Robot::~Robot()
151  {
152  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountIOmodules;i++)
153  delete m_pIOmodules[i];
154  delete[] m_pIOmodules;
155  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
156  delete m_pJoints[i];
157  delete[] m_pJoints;
158  }
159 
162  void Robot::set_Override(const double override)
163  {
164  m_Override=override;
165  }
166 
169  double Robot::get_Override() const
170  {
171  return m_Override;
172  }
173 
175  void Robot::PublishState()
176  {
177  sensor_msgs::JointState joint_states;
178  joint_states.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
179  m_JointStatePublisher.publish(joint_states);
180  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
181  m_pJoints[i]->PublishState(joint_states);
182  m_JointStatePublisher.publish(joint_states);
183  cpr_robot::ChannelStates inputChannels;
184  inputChannels.Header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
185  for(size_t i=0;i<m_InputChannels.size();i++)
186  inputChannels.state.push_back(get_Input(i));
187  m_InputChannelsPublisher.publish(inputChannels);
188  cpr_robot::ChannelStates outputChannels;
189  outputChannels.Header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
190  for(size_t i=0;i<m_OutputChannels.size();i++)
191  outputChannels.state.push_back(get_Output(i));
192  m_OutputChannelsPublisher.publish(outputChannels);
193  cpr_robot::RobotState robot_state;
194  robot_state.Header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
195  robot_state.Override=m_Override;
196  robot_state.StatusFlags=0;
197  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
198  {
199  robot_state.StatusFlags|=(uint32_t)m_pJoints[i]->get_ErrorFlags();
200  robot_state.StatusFlags|=((uint32_t)(m_pJoints[i]->get_IsReferenced()?1:0))<<(16+i);
201  }
202  if(!m_Bus.get_IsConnected())
203  robot_state.StatusFlags|=STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED;
204  m_RobotStatePublisher.publish(robot_state);
205  }

286  void Robot::OnInit()
287  {
288  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
289  m_pJoints[i]->Init();
290  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountIOmodules;i++)
291  m_pIOmodules[i]->Init();
292  }

372  uint32_t Robot::define_Input(const bool onSeperateModule, const uint8_t moduleIndex, const uint8_t channelIndex, const std::string& name)
373  {
374  assert(onSeperateModule?moduleIndex<m_CountIOmodules:moduleIndex<m_CountJoints);
375  assert(channelIndex<8);
376  uint32_t id=(uint32_t)m_InputChannels.size();
377  IOchannel channel;
378  channel.OnSeparateModule=onSeperateModule;
379  channel.ModuleIndex=moduleIndex;
380  channel.ChannelIndex=channelIndex;
381  channel.Name=name;
382  m_InputChannels.push_back(channel);
383  return id;
384  }
385 
392  uint32_t Robot::define_Output(const bool onSeperateModule, const uint8_t moduleIndex, const uint8_t channelIndex, const std::string& name)
393  {
394  assert(onSeperateModule?moduleIndex<m_CountIOmodules:moduleIndex<m_CountJoints);
395  assert(channelIndex<8);
396  uint32_t id=(uint32_t)m_OutputChannels.size();
397  IOchannel channel;
398  channel.OnSeparateModule=onSeperateModule;
399  channel.ModuleIndex=moduleIndex;
400  channel.ChannelIndex=channelIndex;
401  channel.Name=name;
402  m_OutputChannels.push_back(channel);
403  return id;
404  }
405 
409  void Robot::set_Output(const uint32_t index, const bool state)
410  {
411  assert(index<m_OutputChannels.size());
412  if(m_OutputChannels[index].OnSeparateModule)
413  m_pIOmodules[m_OutputChannels[index].ModuleIndex]->set_DigitalOutput(m_OutputChannels[index].ChannelIndex,state);
414  else
415  m_pJoints[m_OutputChannels[index].ModuleIndex]->set_DigitalOutput(m_OutputChannels[index].ChannelIndex,state);
416  }
417 
421  bool Robot::get_Input(const uint32_t index) const
422  {
423  assert(index<m_InputChannels.size());
424  if(m_InputChannels[index].OnSeparateModule)
425  return m_pIOmodules[m_InputChannels[index].ModuleIndex]->get_DigitalInput(m_InputChannels[index].ChannelIndex);
426  else
427  return m_pJoints[m_InputChannels[index].ModuleIndex]->get_DigitalInput(m_InputChannels[index].ChannelIndex);
428  }
429 
433  bool Robot::get_Output(const uint32_t index) const
434  {
435  assert(index<m_OutputChannels.size());
436  if(m_OutputChannels[index].OnSeparateModule)
437  return m_pIOmodules[m_OutputChannels[index].ModuleIndex]->get_DigitalOutput(m_OutputChannels[index].ChannelIndex);
438  else
439  return m_pJoints[m_OutputChannels[index].ModuleIndex]->get_DigitalOutput(m_OutputChannels[index].ChannelIndex);
440  }
